purpose: Facilitates communication and interoperability among opaque agentic applications by providing a standardized protocol.
principle: Builds on a protocol-driven approach to enable agentic applications to communicate and interoperate, ensuring seamless interaction.
reusability: Offers a protocol that can be integrated into various agentic applications for enhanced interoperability, with potential for broad adoption in multi-agent systems.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features or potential instability; limited to applications that can adopt the protocol.
name: A2A
description: An open protocol enabling communication and interoperability between opaque agentic applications.
highlight: Enables seamless communication and interoperability between agentic applications through an open protocol.
